attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since when were the rules changed on Strictly Come Dancing for the public to have to vote for who the Judges think should win over and above the public vote. If you think John Sergeant has been unfairly treated and should be re-instated  untill the public decide it's time to take a well deserved bow; please sign this petition.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
